news.content:
We’ve joined forces with some incredible European open source projects with the collective ambition to build Europe’s next-generation edge computing platform!


🌐 SovereignEdge.EU


Please find the announcement on Twitter and show your support. The more noise we make with this application, the more chances for our ecosystem to develop Europe's edge cloud. 🙏
news.excerpt: We've submitted a joint proposal to the European Commission to build Europe's next-generation edge computing platform!

next.title: Today is Earth Day!
next.excerpt: At ThreeFold, we believe in "Planet First." Take a look at some of the ways ThreeFold is acting to positively impact the planet.
